item.description: Vitalik Buterin recently spoke at EthParis 2022, outlining his long-term and short-term goals for Ethereum. We examine the roadmap he lays out and will also break down vital technical features to play an essential role in Ethereum’s future. Prerequisites Knowledge of Proof of Work (PoW), Proof of Stake (PoS), and [Layer-2 (L2)](https://ethereum.org/en/layer-2/#:~:text=A layer 2 is a separate blockchain that extends Ethereum.&text=A layer 2 blockchain regularly,layer 1 protocol (Ethereum).) scaling is needed to get the most out of this article.

item.title: Optimism vs. Arbitrum - A Complete Comparison
item.description: Optimism and Arbitrum , two of the largest layer-two (L2) solutions that utilize Optimistic rollup technology to scale the Ethereum network. I will do a full comparison in this article. Background Optimism and Arbitrum are two of the largest layer-two (L2) solutions that utilize Optimistic rollup technology to scale the Ethereum network. Source: https://l2fees.info/ At present, Ethereum’s high transaction fees and limited throughput of ~15 transactions per second (TPS) severely limits its scalability.
